classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: MATH161, MATH141, MATH221.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, C2, C3, C4, C1-C5 elective, D1, D3, D4, and D5. C4 and D5 should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). NOTE: GE Area B2 is included in concentrations. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
